page.title: 01St.Albans: Gazetteer.
page.content: {St.Albans,City,Dist.Council,Herts.} 20ml N.W.of London.City dates back 2000yrs.and faces remains of Roman Verulamium.Remains inc.a{hypocaust}and 2nd cent.A.D.{theatre.}The cathedral built by Saxons crowns a hill.{Abbey re-built by Normans and enlarged in 13th C.{Clock Tower}15th C.{High St. Light indust. inc. engin.,clothing, foodstuffs.{Av.house prices}Det.80000 Semi:60000,Terr.46000{Rlwy Stn:}20min: St.Pancras/London.150min: Sheffield. {M1:}5ml.{M10:}1ml.{M25.}3ml. Market: Wed and Sat.{Stores and shops:}cater for resid.and tourists.{Carnival: Aug.Bank.Hol.Mon. Leisure fac.inc. Museums,theatre,cinema,sports centre, golf crse,tenn.crts,putting grn.{Est. {local paper}"Herts Advertiser".{M.P. Peter Lilley{Con. M.E.P}Derek Prag{ {Con.}Pop.{(1981)}St.Albans 50888:inc. dist.124876.{Unempl.}below Nat.Av.
